tool_description: Zip Code Galore! Postal Codes and Zip Codes made easy. Free API with JSON Response Format. Over 60 Countries Supported. Perfect for Form Autocompletion. Open for Crowdsourcing and Contribution.

api_list.name: Get Zip Code info
api_list.description: Retrieve information about a specific zip code in the specified country.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The country code for the zip code lookup.

required_parameters.name: postal_code
required_parameters.description: The postal code to look up.

api_list.name: Get info by city
api_list.description: Retrieve information about a specific city in the specified state and country.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The country code for the city lookup.

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: The state abbreviation for the city lookup.

required_parameters.name: city
required_parameters.description: The name of the city to look up.
